title: >>> Who's Getting PIED?
body_text:
Pairs of best friends split into two awesome combinations when
John Tronolone
joins forces with
Lenny Herrera
to take on
Kevin Adams
and female star
Valerie Winston
! This is their stories heading into the first-ever
CREAMation Rules
Match ...
HERRERA / ADAMS
This one is just far more serious. Sure they're friends, but in the intense battles of dodgeball, your closest buddies always create the most bitter of rivals. This friendship-turned-feud can be traced to the Summer of 2006.
The 4 and 0 Joe Kelly headed into his unprecedented fifth straight match as captain. The then-holder of the now-defunct Captains Championship was on a tear, defeating superstar after superstar, anxiously awaiting the next challenger. At the conclusion of DODGEBALL 41, one Lenny Herrera respectfully challenged the "King of Captains" to a title match at DODGEBALL 42, a wish that Kelly granted.
After all was said and done, DODGEBALL 42 belonged to the young prodigy Herrera doing what no man, before or after, had ever done; defeat the iconic Joe Kelly. Lenny had dethroned the "King of Captains", crowning himself the new title holder. It was then that Kevin Adams wanted a crack at the coveted championship.
It was during this competitive time however that Kevin decided to take a brief sabbatical, absent from events 41 to XLIV. Set to return at what would arguably be the most exciting and thrilling
Wet War
to date, DODGEBALL 45, Kevin reserved the #1 Contender's spot at the event, hoping and praying Herrera would remain the champ. But fate reared its head as a returning Wesley Hebrew took the prized title from Lenny at XLIV, one week shy of Kevin's return.
Upon hearing the news, Adams backed out of his reserved slot at DODGEBALL 45 and his match with Herrera never took place.
Exactly 9 months to the date of DODGEBALL 45, both men finally get the opportunity to settle their differences. Their partners are just as ready.
TRONOLONE / WINSTON
Eight years in the making ... High School grads, Applebee's employees, Dodgeball legends, and perhaps more importanly, soon-to-be WrestleMania 23 Attendees. Valerie and John look to have one giant laugh at their final dodgeball event for two weeks.
They've seen it all and they sure as hell have done it all. Talk about dedication and determination, look no further than this pair of framers.
Valerie has earned her spot as one of only twelve
Female Titans
, patenting the controversial sideline throw. She's seen them come and seen them go, but she herself has remained as one of dodgeball's true legends.
A similar story to his opponent, John's perfect attendance gives him all the experience he needs. He's the only player in history to have teamed and/or faced every competitor to have set foot on the dodgeball courts. His love and passion for this game goes without saying.
Though their personal "feud" in this 2-on-2 encounter may not reach the intensity of Herrera/Adams, don't think for a second either will be slacking off. They will not hesitate to eliminate the other.
--->>
CREAMation Rules
The losing duo will have a whipped creamed filled pie shoved in their face courtesy their opponents! One team creamed ... Literally!
How much "sweeter" can it possibly get?
body_html:
Pairs of best friends split into two awesome combinations when John Tronolone joins forces with Lenny Herrera to take on Kevin Adams and female star Valerie Winston! This is their stories heading into the first-ever CREAMation Rules Match ...

HERRERA / ADAMS
This one is just far more serious. Sure they're friends, but in the intense battles of dodgeball, your closest buddies always create the most bitter of rivals. This friendship-turned-feud can be traced to the Summer of 2006.

The 4 and 0 Joe Kelly headed into his unprecedented fifth straight match as captain. The then-holder of the now-defunct Captains Championship was on a tear, defeating superstar after superstar, anxiously awaiting the next challenger. At the conclusion of DODGEBALL 41, one Lenny Herrera respectfully challenged the "King of Captains" to a title match at DODGEBALL 42, a wish that Kelly granted.

After all was said and done, DODGEBALL 42 belonged to the young prodigy Herrera doing what no man, before or after, had ever done; defeat the iconic Joe Kelly. Lenny had dethroned the "King of Captains", crowning himself the new title holder. It was then that Kevin Adams wanted a crack at the coveted championship.

It was during this competitive time however that Kevin decided to take a brief sabbatical, absent from events 41 to XLIV. Set to return at what would arguably be the most exciting and thrilling Wet War to date, DODGEBALL 45, Kevin reserved the #1 Contender's spot at the event, hoping and praying Herrera would remain the champ. But fate reared its head as a returning Wesley Hebrew took the prized title from Lenny at XLIV, one week shy of Kevin's return.

Upon hearing the news, Adams backed out of his reserved slot at DODGEBALL 45 and his match with Herrera never took place.

Exactly 9 months to the date of DODGEBALL 45, both men finally get the opportunity to settle their differences. Their partners are just as ready.

TRONOLONE / WINSTON
Eight years in the making ... High School grads, Applebee's employees, Dodgeball legends, and perhaps more importanly, soon-to-be WrestleMania 23 Attendees. Valerie and John look to have one giant laugh at their final dodgeball event for two weeks.

They've seen it all and they sure as hell have done it all. Talk about dedication and determination, look no further than this pair of framers.

Valerie has earned her spot as one of only twelve Female Titans, patenting the controversial sideline throw. She's seen them come and seen them go, but she herself has remained as one of dodgeball's true legends.

A similar story to his opponent, John's perfect attendance gives him all the experience he needs. He's the only player in history to have teamed and/or faced every competitor to have set foot on the dodgeball courts. His love and passion for this game goes without saying.

Though their personal "feud" in this 2-on-2 encounter may not reach the intensity of Herrera/Adams, don't think for a second either will be slacking off. They will not hesitate to eliminate the other.

--->> CREAMation Rules
The losing duo will have a whipped creamed filled pie shoved in their face courtesy their opponents! One team creamed ... Literally!

How much "sweeter" can it possibly get?
